page.title: 10The Parish Hall-Welshampton
page.content: The Parish Hall was built in the year 1920. It was built for social life and for dances and for the youth of the village.The money was a gift from Lord Brownlow and the Mainwarings.The Parish Hall is run by a subcommittee of the council.There is no membership subscription for the Parish Hall.The money is for functions to pay for the upkeep.It is heated by calor gas,and electricity in the kitchen.There is a snooker table,dartboard,and table tennis tables .They have quite a lot of functions like Whist Drives,Bingo,Bring and Buy,Youth Club,private parties, birthday parties.There are other functions like fetes, tennis, 5 a-side football.The Parish Hall does not have a Sports Committee,the sports facilities are run by a separate body of people.
